title: Shakhta
data: Shakhta (Russian: Шахта) is a rural locality (a settlement) in Kizel Urban okrug, Perm Krai, Russia. The population was 1,109 as of 2010.[2] There are 49 streets. Shakhta is located 6 km north of Kizel (the district's administrative centre) by road. Kizel is the nearest rural locality.[3] This Perm Krai location article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
